input.old_string:
from dataclasses import dataclass
from datetime import date
from fastlite import database

@dataclass
class Card:
    id: int = None
    front: str = ""
    back: str = ""
    next_review: str = ""
    interval: int = 0

db = database("cards.db")
cards = db.create(Card, pk="id")

input.content:
# Tests will be generated by FTL campaign
import pytest
from starlette.testclient import TestClient
from main import app, cards, Card
from datetime import date

@pytest.fixture
def client():
    # Clear cards before each test
    for c in cards():
        cards.delete(c.id)
    return TestClient(app)

def test_root_redirects_to_cards(client):
    response = client.get("/", follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"

def test_cards_list_empty(client):
    response = client.get("/cards")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"Cards" in response.content

def test_cards_list_with_cards(client):
    cards.insert(Card(front="Test Front", back="Test Back", next_review=str(date.today()), interval=1))
    response = client.get("/cards")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"Test Front" in response.content
    assert b"Test Back" in response.content

def test_cards_new_form(client):
    response = client.get("/cards/new")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"New Card" in response.content
    assert b"front" in response.content
    assert b"back" in response.content

def test_cards_create(client):
    response = client.post("/cards/new", data={"front": "Q1", "back": "A1"}, follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"
    # Verify card was created
    all_cards = list(cards())
    assert len(all_cards) == 1
    assert all_cards[0].front == "Q1"
    assert all_cards[0].back == "A1"

def test_cards_delete(client):
    card = cards.insert(Card(front="To Delete", back="Will be gone", next_review=str(date.today()), interval=1))
    response = client.post(f"/cards/{card.id}/delete", follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"
    # Verify card was deleted
    assert len(list(cards())) == 0

    10→    back: str = ""

    31→    return H2("New Card"), Form(
    32→        Label("Front:"), Input(name="front", type="text"),
    33→        Label("Back:"), Textarea(name="back"),
    34→        Button("Create Card", type="submit"),
    35→        action="/cards/new", method="post"
    36→    )
    37→
    38→@rt("/cards/new")
    39→def post(front: str, back: str):
    40→    cards.insert(Card(front=front, back=back, next_review=str(date.today()), interval=1))
    41→    return RedirectResponse("/cards", status_code=303)
    42→
    43→@rt("/cards/{id}/delete")
    44→def post(id: int):
    45→    cards.delete(id)
    46→    return RedirectResponse("/cards", status_code=303)

# Tests will be generated by FTL campaign
import pytest
from starlette.testclient import TestClient
from main import app, cards, Card
from datetime import date

@pytest.fixture
def client():
    # Clear cards before each test
    for c in cards():
        cards.delete(c.id)
    return TestClient(app)

def test_root_redirects_to_cards(client):
    response = client.get("/", follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"

def test_cards_list_empty(client):
    response = client.get("/cards")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"Cards" in response.content

def test_cards_list_with_cards(client):
    cards.insert(Card(front="Test Front", back="Test Back", next_review=str(date.today()), interval=1))
    response = client.get("/cards")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"Test Front" in response.content
    assert b"Test Back" in response.content

def test_cards_new_form(client):
    response = client.get("/cards/new")
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert b"New Card" in response.content
    assert b"front" in response.content
    assert b"back" in response.content

def test_cards_create(client):
    response = client.post("/cards/new", data={"front": "Q1", "back": "A1"}, follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"
    # Verify card was created
    all_cards = list(cards())
    assert len(all_cards) == 1
    assert all_cards[0].front == "Q1"
    assert all_cards[0].back == "A1"

def test_cards_delete(client):
    card = cards.insert(Card(front="To Delete", back="Will be gone", next_review=str(date.today()), interval=1))
    response = client.post(f"/cards/{card.id}/delete", follow_redirects=False)
    assert response.status_code == 303
    assert response.headers["location"] == "/cards"
    # Verify card was deleted
    assert len(list(cards())) == 0
